name: The Hollow Vessel
description:
A doll sits alone in a far-off wasteland pit.
For the first time someone finds her in this entropized limbo.

A short linear VN with no choices and 1 ending.

Music by Blood Machine (@Fleshsqueeze)

-------------------------------------------------------

[Spacebar] or [Left Mouse Button] to advance text.

[Escape] to instantly quit game.

You cannot save the game and it should be completable in a single seating (about 15 minutes).
